name: Aquil BURGESS, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Burgess v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Aquil BURGESS, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of July, 2009, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
977 A.2d 1085
Aquil BURGESS, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 81 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 21, 2009.
